main event: A round, silver-colored object was reported hovering in the sky over Salem, Massachusetts, on July 15, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed at approximately 500 feet above the ground.,The witness watched the object for about 5 minutes before it accelerated rapidly and vanished.,The witness was located at the junction of Bridge and Canal Streets.,The witness reported the sighting to the local police department.,No other witnesses have been located related to this sighting.
witness description: one adult individual at the junction of Bridge and Canal Streets
